member.returns: True if the member was found (even if its value is null). False otherwise.

member.summary: Returns the value of the member with the specified name cast to a double.

The value of the member cast to a double or null.
member.returns: True if the member was found and can be cast to a double. False otherwise.

Set to true to include spatial reference.
member.returns: The resulting JsonObject.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.Conversion.ToJson(ESRI.ArcGIS.Geodatabase.IRecordSet)
member.summary: Converts an ArcObjects RecordSet to a JSON UTF-8 string (and returns it as an array of bytes). The geometries in each Record will be generalized and densified, before they are serialized to JSON.
member.param: The RecordSet to convert.
member.returns: The JSONN string (UTF-8) as an array of bytes.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.AddInPackageAttribute
member.summary: AddIn package attribute. Use it do annotate an addIn package from your assembly. IMPORTANT: You can have multiple assemblies in your AddIn package, please use AddInPackageAttribute only once per AddIn, not once per assembly!

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.AddInPackageAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: AddIn package attribute constructor. IMPORTANT: You can have multiple assemblies in your AddIn package, please use AddInPackageAttribute only once per package, not once per assembly!
member.param: The name of the add-in package.
Unique ID of the package. This is a GUID in a registry format.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.AddInPackageAttribute.Name
member.summary: The name of the add-in package.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.AddInPackageAttribute.ID
member.summary: Unique ID of the package. This is a GUID in registry format.

member.summary: Package description.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.AddInPackageAttribute.Version
member.summary: Package version.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.AddInPackageAttribute.Author
member.summary: Package author.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.AddInPackageAttribute.Company
member.summary: A company or entity that developed this package.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.AddInPackageAttribute.Date
member.summary: Packaging date.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.AddInPackageAttribute.TargetProduct
member.summary: Target product for the add-in. Usually 'Server' or 'Desktop'.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.AddInPackageAttribute.TargetVersion
member.summary: Target product's version. For example, '10.1'.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.ServerObjectExtensionAttribute
member.summary: Use ServerObjectExtension attribute to annotate main SOE class that implements IServerObjectExtension. An Add-in package can have multiple ServerObjectExtension classes.

member.summary: ServerObjectExtension attribute constructor.
member.param: Type of the server object that this SOE was designed for. Example: 'MapServer'.

member.summary: SOE display name that you will see in Manager or other admin client.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.ServerObjectExtensionAttribute.Description
member.summary: SOE description.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.ServerObjectExtensionAttribute.DefaultCapabilities
member.summary: Default set of web capabilities in comma-separated list. Subset of AllCapabilities.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.ServerObjectExtensionAttribute.AllCapabilities
member.summary: All web capabilities in a comma-separated list.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.ServerObjectExtensionAttribute.SupportsREST
member.summary: Shows that SOE supports REST API. Default is false.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.ServerObjectExtensionAttribute.SupportsSOAP
member.summary: Shows that SOE supports SOAP API. Default is false.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.ServerObjectExtensionAttribute.Properties
member.summary: SOE properties.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.ServerObjectExtensionAttribute.ServerObjectType
member.summary: Type of the server object that this SOE was designed for. Example: 'MapServer'.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.ServerObjectExtensionAttribute.HasManagerPropertiesConfigurationPane
member.summary: Set this flag to true if you have custom JS widged for the SOE properties pane in Manager.

member.summary: The name of the resource.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.RestResource.isCollection
member.summary: Indicates if the resource is a collection.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.RestResource.isDefaultCollection
member.summary: Indicates if the resource is a default collection. Default collection is a collection resource that can allows collection item access by a short URL. For example: if we have 'layers' resource, it's usually allows item access by this URL: <base url>/layers/<itemID> If you make it a default collection, you will be able to access it by the short URL: <base url>/<itemID> There can only be one default collection per set of siblings. For example: if we have two siblings <base url>/layers and <base url>/tables, only one can be a default collection.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.RestResource.RequiredCapability
member.summary: The capability required in a configuration for a resource to be callable.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SoeRestImpl
member.summary: An "implementation" helper class that can be contained by REST SOEs.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SoeRestImpl.#ctor(System.String,ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.RestResource)
member.summary: Creates an instance of SoeRestImpl. Capability checking is set to default(looks for an item in comma-separated list, uses case-insensitive comparizon).
member.param: The name of the Server Object Extension (SOE).
A reference to the REST SOE's root resource.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SoeRestImpl.#ctor(System.String,ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.RestResource,ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.CheckCapabilityHandler)
member.summary: Creates an instance of SoeRestImpl.
member.param: The name of the Server Object Extension (SOE).
A reference to the REST SOE's root resource.
A reference to the capability checking delegate. If you pass null, capability checking will be disabled.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.OperationHandler
member.summary: A delegate type that defines the signature for REST operation handler functions.
member.param: A collection of the IDs of sub-resources in collection resources (e.g. The bound variable "LayersID" for a collection resource called "Layers" contains the ID of the sub-resource.)
A JsonObject instance with the input for the operation.
The requested output format, for example "json".
Well-known properties of the request.
Well-known properties for the response.

member.summary: A class that helps generating the responseProperties string for a resource or operation.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.RestResponseProperties.#ctor
member.summary: RestResponseProperties constructor. Sets content type to "text/plain;charset=utf-8" Sets data type to esriWebResponseDataType.esriWRDTPayload

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.RestResponseProperties.ToString
member.summary: Generates a comma-separated list of properties to be returned to the http handler

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.RestResponseProperties.ContentType
member.summary: Defines the value of the Content-Type http header. Default value is "text/plain;charset=utf-8" (valid for JSON)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.RestResponseProperties.IsError
member.summary: Indicates if an error happened when processing a request. Some properties may not be written if that is the case.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.RestResponseProperties.ResponseDataType
member.summary: Indicates if the response is sent embedded to the http handler (esriWRDTPayload, the default), or if a file is written in an output directory and the http handler should pick it up from there (esriWRDTFileToReturn)
